content.rendered:
Cosmetic Reconstruction Cosmetic

Cosmetic

alloClae Structural Adipose Tissue Structural adipose tissue provides a wide range of natural options for breast and body procedures, all in a ready-to-use, non-surgical product. 

Bellafill is the biostimulatory filler that outlasts all others. This long-lasting, FDA-approved dermal filler provides both immediate correction and natural collagen stimulation.1 

Aveli® is a new standard in cellulite treatment delivering fast, real results that last2. This innovative treatment provides long-term reduction in the appearance of cellulite in both the buttocks and thighs in a single procedure3. 

Our implants have an unrivaled safety profile4 and offer a wide range of available widths and projections, all with the balanced strength and softness of our High Strength Cohesive Gel. 

The Viality Enhanced Viability Fat Transfer system helps wash away the barriers to fat retention. As the only FDA-cleared system with a surfactant shown to enhance the survival of fat cells, Viality can help elevate your outcomes.5 

The Tiger Guard implant delivery device employs a No-Touch delivery technique which may reduce post operative complications6,7,8 and allow for smaller incisions than classic insertion techniques. 

Instalift is the first absorbable suture FDA-cleared for cosmetic facial procedures.9 The procedure only takes under an hour at a doctor’s office. Patients can get right back to their activities and enjoy an instant lift in the cheeks, while adding volume over time for long-lasting results. 

Amplifine is a PRP platform that delivers ideal platelet concentrations. The system is 510(k)-cleared for the safe and rapid preparation of PRP at the patient point of care. It delivers up to 5X platelet concentration.*10 
*Mean platelet concentration by removing ~10 mL of Platelet Poor Plasma (PPP).

REFERENCES:
  1. Bellafill® [US Instructions for Use]. San Diego, CA: Suneva Medical, Inc.; 2023.
  2. Stevens WG, et al. Multicenter Pivotal Study Demonstrates Safety and Efficacy of a New Cellulite Procedure: Final Results at 12 Months [published online ahead of print, 2022 Nov 10] Aethet Surg J. 2022; sjac291.
  3. Emanuele E. Cellulite: advances in treatment: facts and controversies. Clin Dermatol. 2013; 31:725-730.
  4. Stevens WG, et al. Ten-year core study data for Sientra’s Food and Drug Administration -approved round and shaped breast implants with cohesive silicone gel. Plast Reconstr Surg. 2018; 141(4S):7S-19S.
  5. Medina MA 3rd, et al. Polymer therapy: a novel treatment to improve fat graft viability. Plast Reconstr Surg. 2011 Jun; 127(6):2270-2282. doi: 10.1097/PRS.0b013e3182139fc1. PMID: 21617461
  6. Moyer, HR, et al. Contamination in Smooth Gel Breast Implant Placement:Testing a Funnel Versus Digital Insertion Technique in a Cadaver Model. Aesthetic Surgery Journal. 2012; 32(2) 194-199.
  7. Flugstad, NA, et al. Does Implant Insertion with a Funnel Decrease Capsular Contracture? A Preliminary Report Nicholas. Aesthetic Surgery Journal. 2016; 26 (5). 550-556.
  8. Montemurro, P, et al. Controllable factors to reduce the Rate of Complications in Primary Breast Augmentation: Review of the Literature. Aesthetic Plastic Surgery. 2020.
  9. Silhouette InstaLift™ [US Instructions for Use]. Irvine, CA: Sinclair Pharmaceuticals; 2021.
  10. Amplifine HD PRP Gel Tube (15 and 30 mL) [Instructions for Use]. San Diego, CA: Suneva Medical, Inc.; 2020.
 Reconstruction

Reconstruction

Our reconstruction line offers a full range of products to help you advance the standard of care.

The alloX2 breast tissue expander is the only breast tissue expander with an integrated drain. It empowers clinicians with immediate, direct, nonsurgical access to the periprosthetic space for serous fluid drainage and expedited treatment response.1 

The Dermaspan soft shell, single-port breast tissue expander is designed to enable a gentler, more predictable expansion, and more comfortable patient experience. 

Our implants have an unrivaled safety profile2 and offer a wide range of available widths and projections, all with the balanced strength and softness of our High Strength Cohesive Gel. 

The Viality Enhanced Viability Fat Transfer system helps wash away the barriers to fat retention. As the only FDA-cleared system with a surfactant shown to enhance the survival of fat cells, Viality can help elevate your outcomes.3 

SimpliDerm’s proprietary, patented and gentle process achieves a sterility assurance level (SAL) of 10-6 with minimal impact to the extracellular matrix and key growth factors. This innovative process results in better handling and performance, healthy inflammatory response and rapid tissue integration.4,5 

REFERENCES:
  1. Liu F, et al. Advances in Tissue Expander Technology Enable Early Targeted Intervention in Prepectoral Breast Reconstruction. Plast Reconstr Surg Glob Open. 2021;9(8):e3781. Published 2021 Aug 19. doi:10.1097/GOX.0000000000003781
  2. Stevens WG, et al. Ten-year core study data for Sientra’s Food and Drug Administration -approved round and shaped breast implants with cohesive silicone gel. Plast Reconstr Surg. 2018;141(4S):7S-19S.
  3. Medina MA 3rd, et al. Polymer therapy: a novel treatment to improve fat graft viability. Plast Reconstr Surg. 2011 Jun;127(6):2270-2282. doi: 10.1097/PRS.0b013e3182139fc1. PMID: 21617461
  4. Ji H, et al. Characterization of Inflammatory and Fibrotic Aspects of Tissue Remodeling of Acellular Dermal Matrix in a Nonhuman Primate Model. Plast Reconstr Surg Glob Open. 2021 Feb 16;9(2):e3420.
  5. LT-0032 Rev. 01, “SimpliDerm Scientific Overview”

Harness the power of regenerative aesthetics.

Contact a Representative
